articles.title: Hari Krishna
articles.contents:
HK

          Blog
          Projects
          CV
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          Hari Krishna
          
            
                
                  
                    
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    
                  
                
              
                          
        

        
          
      
      
        
          Hey,
          I’m currently working as a Senior Analyst at
          DataZymes.Describe myself as a Sport Enthusiast, passionate
          towards statistics & number crunching.Active member &
          contributor in open source community.My Blogs & Projects
          are majorly related to Sports
          You can check my Blogs,Projects,CV in the
          above menu and to get in touch with me follow my social
          handles linked
          For Better view of the site, Use Desktop
          Mode
          
          Experience
          DataZymes | Senior Analyst
          | February 2022 - Present
          Worked on R Shiny Dashboard Development for various
          methodologies which include Marketing Mix Modelling,Test &
          Control Analysis
          Implemented Machine learning modules in the
          dashboard
          Prodian Infotech | Data Analyst
          | May 2021 - January 2022
          Effectively used ML
          algorithms(Classification,Clustering) on Car Insurance
          Data
          Worked on Automated ML platform-Data Robot
          Carried out EDA process and calculated statistical
          measures for important variables
          Kabaddi Adda | Analyst | Intern | November
          2020 - February 2021
          Built Player Comparison Dashboard using R
          Shiny
          Exploratory Data Analysis on Pro Kabaddi data
          Identifying key player metrics for analysis
          
          
          Education
          Christ University | Bangalore, India
          Master’s in Data Science | June 2019-April 2021
          Loyola Degree & PG College |
          Telangana, India
          B.S.C. in Mathematics,Statistics & Computer Science |
          June 2016 - April 2019
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Hari Krishna
